text: Peter McCarthy may refer to: * Peter McCarthy (American film producer), film producer, director, screenwriter, and actor * Peter J McCarthy, Irish filmmaker, producer, photographer and artist * Peter McCarthy (industrialist) (1845–1919), American manufacturer, businessman and philanthropist from Troy, New York * Pete McCarthy (1951–2004), English comedian, radio and television presenter and travel writer. * Peter McCarthy, drummer with Big Tom and The Mainliners
title: Peter McCarthy
